title: RSS or Email PLEASE!
content:
So when will Typophile get either an actually working  
RSS feed (that sends off more than the first post of a new  
thread, and buggily to boot) or revert to the perfectly  
fine email delivery method?

Using the tracker is major pointless overhead.

hhp
author: hrant

comments.content: I agree. I didnâ€™t even know there was any sort of tracker. I had bookmarked threads I wanted to watch, and then came back to them later to see if anything new had been posted.
I find the one-per-thread feed handy, given the volume of traffic. Perhaps in addition each thread could get its own feed, so we can follow particular discussions?

My vote is for two general tracker feeds: the existing feed that tracks new threads, and one that tracks all threads plus all replies/comments.

Subscribing to your own user tracker feed is also useful. Find it on your profile page.
